price: 42. Kaadu usuk qellittem aaxigeh iyya ginnilih maxco hinna, isin kassittaanaah eile kaskassowtaanam siinik dagoh.
arabic: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walā biqawli kāhinin qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
